mapper.insert: insert t_monthly_goal set not_todo_id = #{notTodoId}, cost_category = #{costCategory}, goal_cost = #{goalCost}, month_year = #{monthYear}, save_cost = #{goalCost}
mapper.select: select C.use_list_id useListId, A.goal_id goalId, B.name notTodo, A.goal_cost goalCost, sum(C.use_cost) useCostSum, A.month_year monthYear from t_monthly_goal A inner join t_not_todo B on A.not_todo_id = B.not_todo_id inner join t_use_list C on A.goal_id = C.goal_id where A.month_year = date_format(curdate(), '%Y-%m') group by A.goal_id

select A.goal_id goalId, A.month_year monthYear, B.name notTodo, A.cost_category costCategoryId, A.goal_cost goalCost from t_monthly_goal A inner join t_not_todo B on A.not_todo_id = B.not_todo_id inner join t_use_list C on A.goal_id = C.goal_id group by A.goal_id order by A.goal_id desc
select month_year monthYear, sum(save_cost) maxSaveMoney from t_monthly_goal where cost_category = 1 group by month_year order by maxSaveMoney desc limit 1
select month_year monthYear, sum(save_cost) maxSaveTime from t_monthly_goal where cost_category = 2 group by month_year order by maxSaveTime desc limit 1
select sum(save_cost) from t_monthly_goal where cost_category = 1 and month_year between #{startMonth} and #{endMonth}
select sum(save_cost) from t_monthly_goal where cost_category = 2 and month_year between #{startMonth} and #{endMonth}
